overview_of_class: (.34 units) Experiments and independent projects to elucidate the functioning of a cell-cycle specific protein
name: Investigative Laboratory
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 222-0-60 Investigative Laboratory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: (.34 units) Experiments and independent projects to elucidate the functioning of a cell-cycle specific protein

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites:; CHEM 102 or 172; Bio 220 and 221

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Students will work in groups of 4 on a project. An emphasis will be placed on learning scientific inquiry skills such as experimental design, writing research proposals, data collection, data analysis/interpretation, and presentation of results.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Oral presentations, research proposal/ abstract and weekly quizzes.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: All required handouts and online lectures by the instructor will be placed on the course's Canvas web site.
